app.title: Card Box / Tray SVG Generator
app.subtitle: Runs fully in your browser (Pyodide). Generates laser-cut SVG with deterministic finger joints.

steps.title: Student Mode (3 steps)
steps.step2Hint: Choosing a mechanism will set the preset below.
steps.step3Hint: If you don’t know kerf, generate the calibration SVG, cut it, then pick the best label.
steps.check4: Apply values and regenerate final SVG

readouts.jointRule: Joint rule: drawn slot depth = thickness + clearance − kerf = {{drawn}}mm. Expected final slot ≈ thickness + clearance = {{final}}mm.
readouts.computedExternal: Computed external size ≈ W {{w}} × D {{d}} × H {{h}} (mm)
readouts.computedInternal: Computed internal size ≈ W {{w}} × D {{d}} × H {{h}} (mm)

warnings.title: Warnings
warnings.kerfTooBig: Kerf is greater than or equal to thickness. Joints may not work.
warnings.clearanceLarge: Joint clearance looks large for this thickness. Parts may be loose.
warnings.slotInvalid: Slot dimensions are invalid or exceed the front panel.
warnings.minTabs: Min tabs is less than 3. Joints may be weak or misaligned.

footer.tip: Tip: If you deploy this on GitHub Pages, it runs client-side and doesn’t need a server.

dispenseType.title: Dispense type
dispenseType.short: Choose whether you are dispensing stacked items (cards/tiles) or flowing dry solids.

storageTarget.title: Storage target
storageTarget.short: Describe how many items you want to store (for planning only).

dispenseTarget.title: Dispense target
dispenseTarget.short: Describe how you want it to dispense (for planning only).

mechanism.title: Mechanism
mechanism.short: Pick a mechanism; it sets a preset that matches the design.

preset.title: Preset
preset.short: A predefined design template (tray, dispenser, window, box).

dimensionMode.title: Dimension mode
dimensionMode.short: Choose whether your W/D/H refer to inside space (internal) or outside size (external).

thickness.title: Thickness
thickness.short: Material thickness. Commonly 2–4mm for card board / acrylic.

fit.title: Fit
fit.short: Quick fit preset. Tight is stronger but harder to assemble; Loose is easier for students.

sheetWidth.title: Sheet width
sheetWidth.short: How wide your material sheet is, used to lay out parts efficiently.

margin.title: Margin
margin.short: Extra empty space around the sheet edges.

padding.title: Padding
padding.short: Spacing between parts so they don’t overlap.

stroke.title: Stroke
stroke.short: SVG line thickness for display. Usually doesn’t affect cutting if your laser uses paths.

labelsToggle.title: Labels
labelsToggle.short: Add engraved labels (panel names) to help assembly.

lid.title: Lid
lid.short: Add a lid when using the box_with_lid preset.

holdingTabs.title: Holding tabs
holdingTabs.short: Add small bridges so parts stay attached to the sheet after cutting.

tabWidth.title: Tab width
tabWidth.short: Width of each holding tab bridge.

kerf.title: Kerf
kerf.short: How much material your laser removes (cut width). Measure with calibration.

clearance.title: Joint clearance
clearance.short: Extra looseness in joints. Increase if too tight; decrease if too loose.

calSet.title: Calibration set
calSet.short: Choose a short student set or a full list of clearances.

fingerWidth.title: Target tab width
fingerWidth.short: Approximate width of each finger/tab along the joint edge. Leave auto for most cases.

minTabs.title: Min tabs
minTabs.short: Minimum number of tabs on each joint edge.

frontHeight.title: Front height
frontHeight.short: Adjust how tall the front panel is (tray_open_front).

scoop.title: Scoop
scoop.short: Adds a scoop cutout for easier grabbing (tray_open_front).

scoopDepth.title: Scoop depth
scoopDepth.short: How deep the scoop cut goes.

slotY.title: Slot Y
slotY.short: Vertical position of the slot measured from the bottom.
